subject: Skiing
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Cochran’s Ski Area, in Richmond, Vt., has produced two generations of Olympic ski racers, and is a revered community resource where hundreds of local children learn to ski every winter.
snippet: Cochran’s Ski Area, in Richmond, Vt., has produced two generations of Olympic ski racers, and is a revered community resource where hundreds of local children learn to ski every winter.
